Instruction: Peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into cubes.
In a bowl, toss the sweet potato cubes with maple syrup, olive oil, salt, and cinnamon until evenly coated.
Spread the sweet potato cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, stirring halfway through, until the sweet potatoes are tender and caramelized.
Remove from the oven and serve hot as a sweet and savory side dish.
